# Reach For Youth

> Reach For Youth is a nonprofit organization serving Central Indiana for over 50 years, providing mental health counseling, restorative justice programs, and prevention education for youth and families.

## About

- [About Us](https://reachforyouth.org/about/): Our mission, history, team, and impact
- [Services Overview](https://reachforyouth.org/services/): Mental health and restorative justice programs
- [Mental Health Services](https://reachforyouth.org/services/mental-health/): Counseling for youth and families
- [Restorative Justice](https://reachforyouth.org/services/restorative-justice/): Teen Court and diversion programs

## Get Involved

- [Volunteer](https://reachforyouth.org/volunteer/): Volunteer opportunities and sign-up
- [Donate](https://reachforyouth.org/donate/): Support our mission financially
- [Events](https://reachforyouth.org/events/): Upcoming fundraisers and community events
- [Contact](https://reachforyouth.org/contact/): Phone, email, and office locations

## Resources

- [Success Stories](https://reachforyouth.org/success-stories/): Stories of youth and families we have served
